Uses of Package
oracle.ucp.jdbc

Packages that use oracle.ucp.jdbc
oracle.ucp.jdbc Includes various interfaces and classes used by applications to work with JDBC connections and a connection pool. 
oracle.ucp.jdbc.oracle Includes various runtime statistics for the Universal Connection Pool that are specific to Oracle JDBC resources. 

 

Classes in oracle.ucp.jdbc used by oracle.ucp.jdbc
JDBCConnectionPoolStatistics
          Various runtime statistics for the Universal Connection Pool that are specific to JDBC resources.
PoolDataSource
          A connection pool-aware data source interface.
PoolDataSourceImpl
          A connection pool-aware data source.
PoolXADataSource
          A Universal Connection Pool-enabled XA data source.

 

Classes in oracle.ucp.jdbc used by oracle.ucp.jdbc.oracle
JDBCConnectionPoolStatistics
          Various runtime statistics for the Universal Connection Pool that are specific to JDBC resources.
